author: joonhoswe
message: fix(curriculum): typo in step 27 of music player workshop (#60134)

files.patch:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ dashedName: step-27
 
 If `userData.currentSong` is not `null` you need to find the next song to play. Remember that you can use `getNextSong` for that.
 
-Complete your `playNextSong` function so that can play the next song in the playlist. If the current song is the last one, set `userData.currentSong` to `null`, `userData.songCurrentTime` to zero and call the `pauseSong` function.
+Complete your `playNextSong` function so that it plays the next song in the playlist. If the current song is the last one, set `userData.currentSong` to `null`, `userData.songCurrentTime` to zero and call the `pauseSong` function.
 
 # --hints--
